content:
Did you see those... footprints in the grass just now?

Yeep... well, they're usually harmless.

Let's just pretend we didn't see anything.

Statistically speaking, shaking trees drops way more branches than coins,

But I just got hit by a coin~(wry smile)

Every time I sweep up the fallen leaves at the Camp,
new ones appear as soon as I turn around.
Could it be the wind bringing them in, or is there something invisible...
